title: Sejuani Splash Art in Loading Screen
body: Whenever I use Poro Rider Sejuani (or anyone else) it will show the Normal skin for sejuani in the loading screen, but it will still have the title of "Poro Rider Sejuani" . In game the skin works fine though.

replies.body:
Hiya Best Valor NA -

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix.
